Feed Formulation for Cattle and Buffalo
We are happy to introduce an Android application for making total mixed ration for dairy cow and milch buffalo.\nClick one of the options below and follow the pages

This mobile application has been developed by a team of scientist at ICAR-National Institute of Animal Nutrition and Physiology (NIANP), Bengaluru.
This application is useful for the farmer to prepare balanced total mixed ration for a cow or buffalo on least cost basis with available feed ingredients.
Nutrient requirements are calculated on the basis of ICAR (2013) requirements and examples are given based on the practical field condition.
It is encouraged to use more number of locally available ingredients for deriving best combination of least cost feed formulation.

Disclaimer: The calculated ration formation is based on the input given by the user not by the developer.
The ration formulated by this app is only guideline and it cannot be claimed for any commercial or legal purpose.
The loss or any misguidance of the application cannot be claimed from the developer.
It is a guideline of ration formulation.
It may be verified by the Animal Nutritionist before feeding to the animals.
